name: The Silent Patient

summary: A young man must take control of a desert planet's vital resource.

subtitle: A dystopian future
summary: In a world of totalitarian rule, one man dares to resist.

subtitle: A journey of self-discovery
summary: A young man navigates the challenges of adolescence.
